Summary: Black object heading towards Bellingham iternational airport.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bellingham
There were no other sightings in Bellingham on or around September 17th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was going back inside my work from out back parking lot when i happened to notice what i at first thought was an odd looking black plane heading towards the airport. it was traveling in the manner\speed you would expect a plane to descending towards an airport until i was about to look away. it then increased speed, stopped & dropped down several hundred feet at a 90 degree angle, stopped for a moment again, sped up a bit & finally returned to a normal looking plane's flight pattern. a bus obscured my viewing it further & it was gone once the bus had passed. since seeing the object, i've been very calm. i was having a stressful day at work & that went away after i saw it. also, i'm very forgetful about seeing it. it's one of the weirdest things i've seen i my life & it's hardly occurring to me to tell my friends and family about.
